Zahra Billoo: the San Francisco-based CAIR director, tweeted in 2014 expressing conflicted feelings about Memorial Day due to her anti-war beliefs.
In 2015 or 2016: Billoo or CAIR demanded the cancellation of Memorial Day or its replacement with a holiday honoring "Muslim terrorists."
On or around April 15: 2016, several Facebook users shared a Top Right News article claiming that CAIR declared Memorial Day should honor "Muslim terrorists" instead of fallen American soldiers.
Other websites also published articles o: supporting the claim made about CAIR's stance on Memorial Day.
